boardgame.name: Der Herr des Eisgartens
The Lord of the Ice Garden
Pán ledové zahrady
Pan Lodowego Ogrodu
boardgame.description: The world of Midgaard, created by author Jarosław Grzędowicz in The Lord of the Ice Garden novel series, is inhabited by a race very similar to humans, filled with magic and for a reason stuck at the cultural and technological level of medieval Viking world. The arrival of scientists from Earth disturbs its fragile balance. The power gained by controlling magic changes the scientists _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; they become possessed by the lust for making this world better. They become gods, who are willing to sacrifice any life, except for their own, of course, to accomplish their _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; great, according to them _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; ideas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players impersonate the scientists struggling for the domination over The Coast of Sails and also for staying on Midgaard, because soon after them another person arrives to this world: Vuko Drakkainen, highly trained agent, whose task is to find the members of scientific expedition and send them back to Earth _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or as a last resort make them vanish. Will the players, as powerful gods, allow him to do it?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the first turn, the players are tossed in the middle of war. They will feel the adrenaline, fear, pain and the heat of a battle. They will smell blood and sweat, hear the clash of arms and the moaning of wounded and dying._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Lord of the Ice Garden takes place on The Coast of Sails, which is divided into several regions. The main goal is fighting for the domination over those regions. A region is dominated by the player with the most influence in it. Dominating the region allows players to collect its resources (M-factor, gold, population), also to win victory points in specific turns, and to accomplish their own goals. Each player has unique winning conditions and special units._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Olaf Fjollsfinn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; uses Ice Drakkars to seduce/kidnap six dwellers of The Coast of Sails to the Ice Garden._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Passionaria Callo _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; sends nightmares on the controlled regions and tries to isolate them. She needs to isolate two of them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pier van Dyken _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; greedy collector of M-factor. When he dominates a region with a magical reserve, he may move it towards his headquarters, The Thorn. He needs to absorb four magical reserves._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Ulrike Freihoff _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; spreads her religion. When she dominates a region where she also has a special unit called The Enlightened One, she may build a Red Tower there. Six of those grant her victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There is also Vuko, who came to evacuate the scientists and clean up their mess. Each turn he goes to the region, where the player with least reputation/morality (it decreases each time the player uses magic) has the most influence. Such a visit is nothing nice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Vuko kills one special unit of that player in this region and lowers his/her influence there._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game may end in one of the three ways:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Meeting the player's unique victory condition _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the game ends and that player is the winner,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; After specified number of turns game ends and the player with most victory points is the winner,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Dead Snow token reaches the end of its track _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; each use of magic shakes the balance of Midgaard. If the players exceed the limit of changes that world and its gods can accept, the game ends and the winner is the player with the highest reputation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;INITIATIVE PHASE:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the initiative phase players decide how many action tokens they will have for the current turn and also determine the player order during the Planning Phase. Moreover, they can initiate scoring of the regions by moving their initiative tokens. In the advanced mode they also determine the order of action fields resolution._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;PLANNING PHASE:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players, one by one in the order determined in the Initiative Phase, place their action tokens on selected action fields._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;ACTION PHASE:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players perform actions in the action fields, in the order determined by the placement of tokens._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Viper's Nest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; player receives one token of any resource. They can also exchange resources._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Influence _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; player may sacrifice up to two population tokens to place as many influence tokens on the region(s) where they already have at least one influence_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Move _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; player may sacrifice up to two gold tokens to make as many moves of their influence tokens and/or special units to the neighboring region(s)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Voracious Mountain _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; player may sacrifice population to move any number of their influence tokens and/or special units from one region to any other region_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Raven's Shadow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; player may raise his/her reputation or use a magic token to get rid of the disadvantageous token of contact with Vuko._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Magic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; allows the player to do any of the three actions: translocate the M-factor, summon special units of the given level, add a new ability to the special unit. Each of those actions results in moving the Dead Snow token up on its track and decreasing the player's reputation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Activation (automatic field) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; after resolving the actions players may activate the abilities of their special units. The order of activation of given abilities is strictly determined. After the activation the situation on the board may change drastically._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Vuko Drakkainen (automatic field) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; each turn Vuko must go to another region. Its figure is placed in the region, where the most immoral player has the most influence. That player receives a conact token decreasing his/her influence, and also loses one special unit in this region (provided he/she had any). In the advanced mode players will be able to equip Vuko with more abilities, that will activate in specific moments of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DOMINATION PHASE:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players collect victory points and resources from the regions, and accomplish their unique goals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Played twice. Shipping cost USA, Europe, Asia, Canada : Standard (4-8 weeks): 18Euro Priority Airmail (2-4weeks - recommended): 30Euro

This is a brand new, unopened copy of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Lord of the Ice Garden_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in perfect condition. Kept in a dehumidified Cupboard. It includes the limited _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ulf`s Bag_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; expansion, which has a miniature of the Ice Garden itself, a variety of 3D tokens and 6 Red Towers. Finally, it also includes the Promo Vuko tiles, which were only available at Essen 2014. The rules for using them can be found here: http://boardgamegeek.com/filepage/109989/promotional-vuko-tiles Multiple purchases from me will greatly reduce shipping. A very rough estimate for shipping to North America is 3,200 Japanese yen. I will ship anywhere in the world. You will not be overcharged for shipping and can check the shipping costs yourself before I ship the game/s.
Open and punched. Otherwise in perfect condition.
